metadata.title: USN-6771-1 -- SQL parse vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that SQL parse incorrectly handled certain nested lists. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6771-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  sqlformat - 0.4.4-1ubuntu0.1 python3-sqlparse - 0.4.4-1ubuntu0.1 python-sqlparse-doc - 0.4.4-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
